A cooperation ninjutsu used by a [[Lightning Release]] and [[Fire Release]] user. The Lightning Release user traps the opponent with an electrical current, shocking the opponent. The Fire Release user then burns the opponent, causing an explosion.

[[es:Técnica de la llegada del Fénix Relámpago]]
[[pl:Raika Hōrai no Jutsu]]
